matrix.vui
Class ScrollPanel

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.AdjustmentListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractViewer
public class ScrollPanel
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
implements java.awt.event.AdjustmentListener

A class representing a panel that allows scrolling. The Panel class does not provide for scrolling so this is an extension.

See Also:

getClient

public java.awt.Component getClient()

update

public void update(java.awt.Graphics g)
The Component implementation of update erases the background and then calls the paint method. By overriding here we reduce screen flicker.
Overrides:
update in class javax.swing.JComponent
Parameters:
g - the specified Graphics window

setBounds

public void setBounds(int x,
                      int y,
                      int w,
                      int h)
Reshapes the Component to the specified bounding box. We override this function to allow for repositioning of contents and adjustment of the scrollbars.
Overrides:
setBounds in class java.awt.Component
Parameters:
x - the x coordinate
y - the y coordinate
width - the width of the component
height - the height of the component

resized

public void resized()
Meant to be supplied by objects derived from ScrollPanel. This will be called during processing of the reshape method to allow the client to arrange his contents and to possibly resize himself if necessary.
